plot: 1916. During the First World War the middlemen of three Germans, who secretly operated for the French, get caught. Hunted for their treason, they try to take refuge in France.
title: The Document
plot_es: 1916. During the First World War the middlemen of three Germans, who secretly operated for the French, get caught. Hunted for their treason, they try to take refuge in France.
plot_en: 1916. During the First World War the middlemen of three Germans, who secretly operated for the French, get caught. Hunted for their treason, they try to take refuge in France.
